definitions: a board placed at or forming the back of something, such as a collage or piece of electronic equipment.
shortDefinitions: board placed at or forming back of something, such as piece of electronic equipment

definitions: a board used to support or straighten a person's back, especially after an accident.
shortDefinitions: board used to support person's back

definitions: an upright board behind the basket, off which the ball may rebound.
shortDefinitions: upright board behind basket, off which ball may rebound
